column2: Formulate an ontology related to fire. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/fire#> .ex:Fire rdf:type owl:Class .ex:ControlledFire rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Fire .ex:Wildfire rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Fire .ex:hasCause rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Fire ; rdfs:range ex:Cause .ex:hasEffect rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Fire ; rdfs:range ex:Effect .ex:hasFuel rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Fire ; rdfs:range ex:Fuel .ex:Cause rdf:type owl:Class .ex:NaturalCause rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Cause .ex:HumanCause rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Cause .ex:Effect rdf:type owl:Class .ex:EnvironmentalImpact rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Effect .ex:EconomicImpact rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Effect .ex:Fuel rdf:type owl:Class .ex:Vegetation rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Fuel .ex:FlammableMaterial rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:Fuel .ex:Lightning rdf:type ex:NaturalCause .ex:Campfire rdf:type ex:HumanCause .ex:Forest rdf:type ex:Vegetation .ex:Petroleum rdf:type ex:FlammableMaterial .ex:FireSpread rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:Wildfire ; rdfs:range ex:GeographicArea .ex:GeographicArea rdf:type owl:Class .ex:ForestArea rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:GeographicArea .ex:UrbanArea rdf:type owl:Class ; rdfs:subClassOf ex:GeographicArea .ex:hasPreventiveMeasure rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ; rdfs:domain ex:ControlledFire ; rdfs:range ex:PreventiveMeasure .ex:PreventiveMeasure rdf:type owl:Class .ex:Firebreak rdf:type ex:PreventiveMeasure .ex:FireBrigade rdf:type ex:PreventiveMeasure .ex:Wildfire ex:hasFuel ex:Vegetation .ex:Wildfire ex:hasCause ex:NaturalCause .ex:ControlledFire ex:hasPreventiveMeasure ex:Firebreak .```

column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: fire. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/fire#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Fire rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Fire" ;    rdfs:comment "A rapid oxidation process resulting in the release of heat and light" .:Fuel rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Fuel" ;    rdfs:comment "A material that feeds fire and is consumed by it" .:Oxygen rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Oxygen" ;    rdfs:comment "A chemical element that supports combustion" .:Heat rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Heat" ;    rdfs:comment "An essential condition required to initiate and sustain a fire" .:Smoke rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Smoke" ;    rdfs:comment "The visible vapor and gases produced by a fire" .:FireTriangle rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Fire Triangle" ;    rdfs:comment "A model for understanding the necessary elements to sustain a fire" .:Flame rdf:type rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:label "Flame" ;    rdfs:comment "The visible, gaseous part of a fire" .:Flash_point rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "Flash point" ;    rdfs:comment "The lowest temperature at which a liquid can form an ignitable mixture in air" ;    rdfs:domain :Fuel ;    rdfs:range xsd:float .:Smoke_production rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "Smoke production" ;    rdfs:comment "The amount of smoke generated when a material burns" ;    rdfs:domain :Fuel ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:requires rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "requires" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a required component for another component to function" ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :FireTriangle .:consumedBy rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "consumed by" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a material consumed by fire" ;    rdfs:domain :Fuel ;    rdfs:range :Fire .:produces rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "produces" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates a product generated by fire" ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :Smoke .:FireTriangle rdfs:subClassOf [    rdf:type rdf:List ;    rdf:first :Fuel ;    rdf:rest [        rdf:first :Oxygen ;        rdf:rest [            rdf:first :Heat ;            rdf:rest rdf:nil        ]    ]] .```

column2: Design an ontology to encompass the following: fire.   Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix : <http://example.org/fire#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .:Fire a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Fire" ;    rdfs:comment "A rapid oxidation process, producing heat, light, and various reaction products." .:Ignition a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Ignition" ;    rdfs:comment "The process of initiating combustion." .:Heat a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Heat" ;    rdfs:comment "Thermal energy produced by fire." .:Fuel a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Fuel" ;    rdfs:comment "Material that is consumed during combustion to produce fire." .:Oxygen a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Oxygen" ;    rdfs:comment "An essential element for combustion in the fire process." .:Flame a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Flame" ;    rdfs:comment "Visible, gaseous part of a fire." .:Smoke a owl:Class ;    rdfs:label "Smoke" ;    rdfs:comment "A collection of airborne solid and liquid particulates and gases emitted when a material undergoes combustion." .:Burning a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Fuel ;    rdfs:range :Fire ;    rdfs:label "burning" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates fuel to the process of burning." .:ProducesHeat a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :Heat ;    rdfs:label "produces heat" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates a fire to the heat it produces." .:RequiresOxygen a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :Oxygen ;    rdfs:label "requires oxygen" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that fire requires oxygen to sustain combustion." .:HasFlame a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :Flame ;    rdfs:label "has flame" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates the presence of flame in a fire." .:EmitsSmoke a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :Smoke ;    rdfs:label "emits smoke" ;    rdfs:comment "Indicates that fire emits smoke." .:HasIgnition a owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Fire ;    rdfs:range :Ignition ;    rdfs:label "has ignition" ;    rdfs:comment "Relates fire to the ignition process." .```
